content.prompt: If resources were perfectly substitutable in all activities, which of the following would be true?

choices.label: Output of all goods could be increased at zero opportunity cost.
The production possibilities curve would be a straight line.
Specialization and mutually beneficial trade would be impossible.
No country or individual would have a comparative advantage in any activity.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
